posts.post_title: Fs: T206 2 card lot beckley & murphy batting both new psa SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nice cards for the grades but minor paper loss on each of the backs keep the grades down. The price is SOLD delivered for the pair PayPal friends/family please. Thanks for looking and I will be listing a lot more of stuff like world series programs and the like.

Joe K
